sentences.sContent: The winners will each receive a voucher for a pair of movie tickets.
sentences.sCn: 获胜者每人将获得一张代币券，可换取两张电影票。

synos.tran: 收据；[法]证人；保证人；证明者

remMethod.val: vouch(担保， 证明) + er(表人或物) → 收据

trans.tranCn: 开支清单； 收据， 票券； 优惠券
trans.tranOther: an official statement or receipt that is given to some­one to prove that their accounts are correct or that money has been paid
